It's a great torrent, but I just have this echo problem with the audio of the actors. Is anyone else having this problem? Otherwise this is an amazing torrent.

It's been reported that SOME media players do not properly seperate the audio tracks resulting in both tracks overlapping/playing at the same time.

The most recent report was a Quicktime user.

There were some tricks to make it work properly... but you might have to try and find another media player that actually follows the MP4 standards and knows how to playback one or the other audio tracks instead of both at the same time.
